metadata.synopsis: You recruit Lae'zel to the party. She tells you the only path to a cure of the tadpole in your head is to make your way to a githyanki creche - a nursery and training grounds.
metadata.how_to_trigger: LZ is not an Avatar and she wasn't dead at the end of the tutorial. Do not progress to the goblin camp or the plains.Free her from the cage in the Chapel area.

8.speaker: Lae'zel
8.text: Has the error of your ways become clear?
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player/looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I would like you to join me.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Wait at my camp. We can speak there.

34.speaker: Lae'zel
34.text: The tadpole hasn't yet scrambled all your senses. Auspicious.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player/looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution.

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.text: But the longer we wait, the more it consumes.

36.speaker: Lae'zel
36.text: You were careless with your weapon. Let us hope the tadpole has not scrambled all your senses.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player/looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution.

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.text: And the longer we wait, the more it consumes.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player/looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.text: My people possess the cure for this infection. I must find a crèche; you will join me.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player/looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: Careful - she obviously sees your kindness as weakness. Don't let her take advantage.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player/looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Careful - she obviously sees your kindness as weakness. Don't let her take advantage.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player/looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Speaking to the player regarding Lae'zel. Discreetly urging caution.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: A crèche? Do you mean a hatchery?

65.speaker: Player
65.text: And what exactly is a crèche...?

87.speaker: Lae'zel
87.text: It is many things. A hatchery, a training grounds, a shelter.

98.speaker: Lae'zel
98.text: Githyanki protocol is clear: when infected with a ghaik tadpole, we must report to a ghustil for purification.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: I thought you already had a cure. With you, right here.

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.text: I made an offer, and you accepted. Your fantasy is not my burden.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: A simple 'thank you' wouldn't go amiss.

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: You may as well suggest a wyvern bow to worms.

69.speaker: Lae'zel
69.text: The cure I offer will suffice as thanks.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Locating a crèche would be wise indeed. Where might we find one?

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: The horned ones mentioned a camp. One there - this Zorru - has seen githyanki.

73.speaker: Lae'zel
73.text: This means a crèche is near.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I honour our alliance, kin. Let us seek a crèche.

53.speaker: Lae'zel
53.text: An ally from Crèche K'liir - few know such fortune. You will call me Lae'zel.

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: Come. We find this Zorru. And we ask where he has seen our kin.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Join me, then. But I'll be watching you closely.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: All right, we journey together. Let's find this crèche.

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: You do not have the authority. Defer to your leader.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: You are full up. Dismiss your weakest warrior.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

68.speaker: Lae'zel
68.text: You are full up. Dismiss your weakest warrior.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Wait at my camp. We can speak there.

37.speaker: Lae'zel
37.text: Very well. But heed my words.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: The horned ones mentioned a camp. One there - this Zorru - has seen githyanki.

54.speaker: Lae'zel
54.text: A crèche must be near. I must interrogate this Zorru. Our very lives depend on it.

93.speaker: Lae'zel
93.text: I will be at your camp. Do not keep me waiting.

89.speaker: Lae'zel
89.text: We scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. They will lead us to a crèche. There, we will be purified.

70.speaker: Lae'zel
70.text: The horned hunters mentioned a sighting - one among them has seen my kind.

46.speaker: Lae'zel
46.text: Come. We scout the roads and scan the skies for children of Gith. They will lead us to a crèche.

29.speaker: Lae'zel
29.text: You have made an ally from Crèche K'liir - few know such fortune. Call me Lae'zel.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

28.speaker: Player
28.text: I'll trust your judgement - but I won't trust her. Not until I've gotten the measure of her.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

96.speaker: Shadowheart
96.text: I'll trust your judgement - but I won't trust her. Not until I've gotten the measure of her.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sh addresses the player. She glances at Lae'zel on 'this one'InternalNodeContext: This node if SH is available and has approval of the player that's greater than 0

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Fool. No point in showing a mad dog kindness - it'll still bite you in the end.

99.speaker: Lae'zel
99.text: You've a sharp tongue, elf. Would that your mind proved its equal.

40.speaker: Shadowheart
40.text: Half-elf. I suppose the finer details are lost on a creature like you.

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.text: Come. The horned ones mentioned a camp. One there - this Zorru - has seen githyanki.

58.speaker: Lae'zel
58.text: A crèche must be near. We will ask this Zorru where he has seen my kin.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: We'll go our separate ways, I think.
84.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: You would sacrifice yourself to ghaik?

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Fine - we can try working together.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Scowl all you like - you have my answer.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I'm dreadfully curious: might one neutralise the tadpole while keeping its powers?
19.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

72.speaker: Lae'zel
72.text: I know my teachings. There are no half measures.
72.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

63.speaker: Lae'zel
63.text: If you wish to be rid of the tadpole, you must either be purified - or beheaded.
63.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Purificiation it is, then. You and I better find this crèche.
57.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: We seem like a poor match, frankly. Let's go our separate ways.
81.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Consider your hunger. Fresh blood flows beneath that skin...
30.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

92.speaker: Lae'zel
92.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

67.speaker: Player
67.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

20.speaker: Player
20.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

71.speaker: Lae'zel
71.context: NodeContext: SHKA-keth! Just like it is spelled.

78.speaker: Shadowheart
78.text: Lies. Just get rid of her.
78.context: NodeContext: Tersely murmured advice. You're not going to trust her, are you?
